major: FIXED: Signature and image insertion now work reliably 100% of time
Resolved z-index conflict between floating panels and insertion overlay
minor: Insertion overlay z-index: 10002 when active (above panels at 10001)
Pending objects z-index: 10003 (always visible during drawing)
patches: Don't remove overlay active class after drawing box
Active class removed only on validateAll() or cancelAll()
Fixed intermittent click detection issues with drawing overlay
